trans-unit.source: Ajani Goldmane
trans-unit.target: 金鬃阿耶尼

trans-unit.resname: LRW·1 | Ajani Goldmane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: You gain 2 life.\n-1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.\n-6: Put a white Avatar creature token into play with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."
trans-unit.target: +1：你获得2点生命。 -1：在每个由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 这些生物获得警戒异能直到回合结束。 -6：将一个白色，具有「此生物的力量和防御力各等同于你的总生命」的圣者衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·2 | Arbiter of Knollridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arbiter of Knollridge
trans-unit.target: 丘脊仲裁者

trans-unit.resname: LRW·2 | Arbiter of Knollridge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进场时，每位牌手的总生命成为所有牌手中总生命最高者的数值。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·2 | Arbiter of Knollridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.
trans-unit.target: 虽然巨人并非永生不死，但其寿命长到让许多小家伙无法相信他们真的会死。

trans-unit.source: Austere Command
trans-unit.target: 严峻指命

trans-unit.resname: LRW·3 | Austere Command | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two Destroy all artifacts; or destroy all enchantments; or destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less; or destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～消灭所有神器；或消灭所有结界；或消灭所有总法术力费用为3或更少的生物；或消灭所有总法术力费用为4或更多的生物。

trans-unit.source: Avian Changeling
trans-unit.target: 舞空化形

trans-unit.resname: LRW·4 | Avian Changeling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 化形 （此牌随时都是所有生物类别。） 飞行

trans-unit.source: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.
trans-unit.target: 他今日随鸟群飞翔。 明日他醒来时，可能发现鸟群已不在，身体也变成陌生的型态。

trans-unit.source: Battle Mastery
trans-unit.target: 精研战技

trans-unit.resname: LRW·5 | Battle Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has double strike.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物具有连击异能。

trans-unit.source: "Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"\n—*Clachan Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「轰！ 轰！ 靴子大如牛车，斧头好似落日。 砍倒地精。 砍倒大树。 就连小丘都得逃到山上去！」 ～《小村轶闻录》

trans-unit.resname: LRW·6 | Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile
trans-unit.target: 英庄园勇士布莉姬

trans-unit.resname: LRW·6 | Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\n{T}: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each attacking or blocking creature target player controls.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 {T}：CARDNAME对由目标牌手操控、且进行攻击或阻挡的所有生物各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·6 | Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Thanks to one champion archer, the true borders of Kinsbaile extend an arrow's flight beyond the buildings.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了某位弓箭好手，让英庄园的边境从建物延长了一箭之遥。

trans-unit.source: Burrenton Forge-Tender
trans-unit.target: 布连屯守炉师

trans-unit.resname: LRW·7 | Burrenton Forge-Tender | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Protection from red\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.
trans-unit.target: 反红保护 牺牲CARDNAME：选择一个红色来源，于本回合中，防止该来源将造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."
trans-unit.target: 「这小村住的都是铁匠。 锻冶炉对我们来说，就像凉冬午后的小火堆一样舒服。"

trans-unit.source: Cenn's Heir
trans-unit.target: 仕绅传人

trans-unit.resname: LRW·8 | Cenn's Heir | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kithkin.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每有一个进行攻击的其它洁英，它便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: His home clachan's familial spirit bolsters his own, but he will be ready to preside over the town as cenn only after he learns to project that strength to others.
trans-unit.target: 他以小村家族精神为支柱，但除非能学会如何展现自己的能力，才能以仕绅身分来管辖。

trans-unit.source: Changeling Hero
trans-unit.target: 化形勇士

trans-unit.resname: LRW·9 | Changeling Hero | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)\nChampion a creature (When this comes into play, sacrifice it unless you remove another creature you control from the game. When this leaves play, that card returns to play.)\nLifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 化形 （此牌随时都是所有生物类别。） 夺冠生物 （当它进场时，除非你将另一个由你操控的生物移出对战，否则牺牲之。 当它离场时，将该牌移回场上。） 系命 （每当此生物造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.source: Cloudgoat Ranger
trans-unit.target: 云山羊巡林者

trans-unit.resname: LRW·10 | Cloudgoat Ranger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens into play.\nTap three untapped Kithkin you control: CARDNAME gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将三个1/1白色洁英／士兵衍生物放置进场。 横置三个由你操控且未横置的洁英：CARDNAME得+2/+0并获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Crib Swap

trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)\nRemove target creature from the game. Its controller puts a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling into play.
trans-unit.target: 化形 （此牌随时都是所有生物类别。） 将目标生物移出对战。 其操控者将一个1/1无色，具化形异能的变形兽衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Dawnfluke
trans-unit.target: 黎明鲽鱼精

trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.\nEvoke {W} (You may play this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it comes into play.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进场时，防止本回合接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的3点伤害。 呼魂{W} （你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来使用它。 若你如此作，它进场时便被牺牲。）

trans-unit.source: Entangling Trap
trans-unit.target: 纠结陷阱

trans-unit.resname: LRW·13 | Entangling Trap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you clash, tap target creature an opponent controls. If you won, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你比点时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。 若你赢，则该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 （此异能在比点结束后触发。）

trans-unit.resname: LRW·14 | Favor of the Mighty | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 强者蒙恩

trans-unit.resname: LRW·14 | Favor of the Mighty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature with the highest converted mana cost has protection from all colors.
trans-unit.target: 每个总法术力费用为最高的生物均获得反五色保护异能。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·14 | Favor of the Mighty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What does a mountain fear of a fly? Giants are barely aware of us, let alone afraid."\n—Gaddock Teeg
trans-unit.target: 「山为何要怕苍蝇？ 巨人根本没注意过我们，更别说惧怕了。」 ～加达提格

trans-unit.source: Galepowder Mage
trans-unit.target: 风粉法师

trans-unit.resname: LRW·15 | Galepowder Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.source: Goldmeadow Dodger
trans-unit.target: 金牧地躲闪客

trans-unit.resname: LRW·16 | Goldmeadow Dodger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被力量大于或等于4的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "I've gotten close enough to a giant to smell his breath, but none has ever so much as spotted me. I wonder how long my record can extend?"
trans-unit.target: 「我与巨人近得可以闻到他呼出的气息，但对方依旧浑然不知。 不知道我这纪录可以保持多久？」

trans-unit.source: Goldmeadow Harrier
trans-unit.target: 金牧地扰敌兵

trans-unit.resname: LRW·17 | Goldmeadow Harrier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."\n—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton
trans-unit.target: 「此事早有明证：从黎明这侧河岸射出的套索石飞得最远最准。」 ～布连屯仕绅迪根

trans-unit.source: Goldmeadow Stalwart
trans-unit.target: 金牧地壮汉

trans-unit.resname: LRW·18 | Goldmeadow Stalwart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, reveal a Kithkin card from your hand or pay {3}.
trans-unit.target: 从你的手上展示一张洁英牌或支付{3}，以作为使用CARDNAME的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: The thoughtweft ties a clachan together. Sharing each other's hopes and fears, all the village's citizens spring into action upon the first threat to any one of them.
trans-unit.target: 纺思让小村结为一体。 村人的希望与恐惧均与全体共享，只要威胁逼近任一个人，就能群起对抗。

trans-unit.source: Harpoon Sniper
trans-unit.target: 鱼叉神射手

trans-unit.resname: LRW·19 | Harpoon Sniper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: CARDNAME deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of Merfolk you control.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的人鱼之数量。

trans-unit.source: Made from whiskergill bones, merrow spinebows can fire bolts through tree trunks.
trans-unit.target: 美洛的脊弓以须嘴鱼的骨头制成，射出的箭能穿透树干。

trans-unit.source: Hillcomber Giant
trans-unit.target: 搜山巨人

trans-unit.resname: LRW·20 | Hillcomber Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者

trans-unit.source: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.
trans-unit.target: 巨人珍视自己在洛温岩山上找到的化石，认为那是在时间中冻结的梦。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·21 | Hoofprints of the Stag | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hoofprints of the Stag
trans-unit.target: 雄鹿蹄印

trans-unit.resname: LRW·21 | Hoofprints of the Stag | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a hoofprint counter on CARDNAME.\n{2}{W}, Remove four hoofprint counters from CARDNAME: Put a 4/4 white Elemental creature token with flying into play. Play this ability only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个蹄印指示物。 {2}{W}，从CARDNAME上移去四个蹄印指示物：将一个4/4白色，具飞行异能的元素衍生物放置进场。 你只可以于自己的回合中使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·22 | Judge of Currents | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Judge of Currents
trans-unit.target: 潮流评定师

trans-unit.resname: LRW·22 | Judge of Currents | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Merfolk you control becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的人鱼成为横置时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·22 | Judge of Currents | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though the currents of the Lanes shift every year, the merrow never lose track of where they are or where they are going.
trans-unit.target: 虽然渠道的潮流年年不同，美洛从未分不清身在何处、该往何方。

trans-unit.source: Kinsbaile Balloonist
trans-unit.target: 英庄园热气球兵

trans-unit.resname: LRW·23 | Kinsbaile Balloonist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may have target creature gain flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以让目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Even when a giant's tantrum turns the sky into a chaotic gale, the path of the balloonist never falters.
trans-unit.target: 即使巨人发怒让天空强风乱刮，热气球兵的路线也不会被扰乱。

trans-unit.source: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
trans-unit.target: 英庄园侦卫

trans-unit.resname: LRW·24 | Kinsbaile Skirmisher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."
trans-unit.target: 「如果哪个波尬胆敢接近族人，我马上会晓得。 而且我会很不高兴。」

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Greatheart
trans-unit.target: 壮志洁英

trans-unit.resname: LRW·25 | Kithkin Greatheart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you control a Giant, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控巨人，CARDNAME便得+1/+1且具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.
trans-unit.target: 有时候好奇的巨人会挑个「小东西」来同行数日，却不晓得这对小东西的生命有多大影响。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Harbinger
trans-unit.target: 先兆洁英

trans-unit.resname: LRW·26 | Kithkin Harbinger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a Kithkin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张洁英牌，展示该牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。

trans-unit.source: Her ears are open to even the softest voice.
trans-unit.target: 再细微的声音都逃不过她耳朵。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Healer
trans-unit.target: 洁英治疗师

trans-unit.source: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The empathetic nature of the thoughtweft allows kithkin healers to treat the cause of an illness rather than fight its symptoms.
trans-unit.target: 纺思这种共感本能，让洁英治疗师不仅治标、更能治本。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·28 | Knight of Meadowgrain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Knight of Meadowgrain
trans-unit.target: 牧谷地骑士

trans-unit.resname: LRW·28 | Knight of Meadowgrain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nLifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 系命 （每当此生物造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: LRW·28 | Knight of Meadowgrain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"
trans-unit.target: 「根据传统，在战后两天内我们绝口不提。 如果成就无法自显光芒，又有什么好提的？」

trans-unit.source: Lairwatch Giant
trans-unit.target: 守园巨人

trans-unit.resname: LRW·29 | Lairwatch Giant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can block an additional creature.\nWhenever CARDNAME blocks two or more creatures, it gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以额外多阻挡一个生物。 每当CARDNAME阻挡两个或更多生物时，它获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: A giant can brood over a grudge for decades, and woe to those who interrupt him.
trans-unit.target: 巨人有数百年可以滋长恨意，打扰者都活该完蛋。

trans-unit.source: Militia's Pride
trans-unit.target: 义勇军之傲

trans-unit.resname: LRW·30 | Militia's Pride | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token into play tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控、且非衍生物的生物攻击时，你可以支付{W}。 若你如此作，则将一个1/1白色洁英／士兵衍生物横置进场且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: If you pick a fight with one kithkin, be ready to fight them all.
trans-unit.target: 如果与一个洁英交战，就得准备与他们全体交战。

trans-unit.source: Mirror Entity
trans-unit.target: 镜身灵

trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)\n{X}: Creatures you control become X/X and gain all creature types until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 化形 （此牌随时都是所有生物类别。） {X}：由你操控的生物成为X/X并获得所有生物类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.
trans-unit.target: 它没察觉洛温的多彩样貌，视线中只有自己投向自己、反射千遍的视线。

trans-unit.source: Neck Snap
trans-unit.target: 断颈击

trans-unit.resname: LRW·32 | Neck Snap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.source: "We merrows need not be disadvantaged when fighting on land. We lack the vulnerability of those who breathe only through their throats."\n—Minnarin, merrow reejerey
trans-unit.target: 「我们美洛在陆地上战斗也不该居劣势。 那些只能从喉咙呼吸的人比我们多一个弱点。」 ～美洛理骑士米纳林

trans-unit.source: Oaken Brawler
trans-unit.target: 橡树喧哗兵

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，与一位对手比点。 若你赢，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 （参与比点的牌手各展示其牌库顶牌，然后将该牌置于牌库顶部或底部。 所展示的牌之总法术力费用比较高的牌手赢得比点。）

trans-unit.source: Oblivion Ring
trans-unit.target: 遗忘轮

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove another target nonland permanent from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将另一个目标非地永久物移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将所移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: A circle of sugar and a word of forbiddance.
trans-unit.target: 糖蜜环圈与禁语一字。

trans-unit.source: Plover Knights
trans-unit.target: 滨鸟骑士

trans-unit.resname: LRW·35 | Plover Knights | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.
trans-unit.target: 骑士是每次收获节祭典的重头戏。 一队队的骑士展演各种大胆战技，让底下的人看得开心。

trans-unit.source: Pollen Lullaby

When CARDNAME comes into play, remove the top seven cards of your library from the game face down.

Skip your draw step.
You can't play more than one spell each turn.

trans-unit.target: 平静如野牛凝望 ～地精用语，意指「安全」

trans-unit.source: Fertile Ground
trans-unit.target: 肥沃大地

trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nWhenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 地结界 每当受此结界的地横置以产生法术力时，其操控者加一点任意颜色的法术力到他的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Pretty, valuable, and delicious—a boggart thief's trifecta.
trans-unit.target: 漂亮，贵重，好吃～波尬小偷三准则。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·212 | Fistful of Force | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 力贯拳锋

trans-unit.resname: LRW·212 | Fistful of Force | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that creature gets an additional +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。 与一位对手比点。 若你赢，则该生物额外再得+2/+2并获得践踏异能直到回合结束。 （参与比点的牌手各展示其牌库顶牌，然后将该牌置于牌库顶部或底部。 所展示的牌之总法术力费用比较高的牌手赢得比点。）

trans-unit.target: 召兽使贾路

trans-unit.source: +1: Untap two target lands.\n-1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token into play.\n-4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：重置两个目标地。 -1：将一个3/3绿色野兽衍生物放置进场。 -4：由你操控的生物得+3/+3并获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Gilt-Leaf Ambush
trans-unit.target: 金叶伏击

trans-unit.resname: LRW·214 | Gilt-Leaf Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens into play. Clash with an opponent. If you win, those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost. Whenever a creature with deathtouch deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1绿色的地精／战士衍生物放置进场。 与一位对手比点。 若你赢，则这些生物获得死触直到回合结束。 （参与比点的牌手各展示其牌库顶牌，然后将该牌置于牌库顶部或底部。 所展示的牌之总法术力费用比较高的牌手赢得比点。 每当此生物对任一生物造成伤害时，消灭后者。）

trans-unit.source: Gilt-Leaf Seer
trans-unit.target: 金叶预言师

trans-unit.resname: LRW·215 | Gilt-Leaf Seer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: {G}，{T}：检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.source: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.
trans-unit.target: 迪梅拉把手下预言师弄瞎，好把自己的美貌深烙入她们最后的影像回忆中。 而这却让她们的预知能力大增。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·216 | Guardian of Cloverdell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guardian of Cloverdell
trans-unit.target: 苜蓿谷守护者

trans-unit.resname: LRW·216 | Guardian of Cloverdell | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens into play.\n{G}, Sacrifice a Kithkin: You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将三个1/1白色洁英／士兵衍生物放置进场。 {G}，牺牲一个洁英：你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·216 | Guardian of Cloverdell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Although they're protective of all creatures, many treefolk are especially fond of the empathic kithkin.
trans-unit.target: 虽然树妖关怀所有生物，但其中有许多特别偏爱能共感的洁英。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·217 | Heal the Scars | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heal the Scars
trans-unit.target: 医治伤疤

trans-unit.resname: LRW·217 | Heal the Scars | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Regenerate target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 重生目标生物。 你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·217 | Heal the Scars | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Elvish battle-magic has evolved two specialties: inflicting wounds that scar, and healing wounds without scarring. Politics determines the recipients of each.
trans-unit.target: 地精战斗法术演变出两个专项：制造带疤伤口，以及无疤医治伤口。 而政治会决定谁会得到哪一个。

trans-unit.source: Hunt Down
trans-unit.target: 捕获

trans-unit.resname: LRW·218 | Hunt Down | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物本回合若能阻挡目标生物，则须阻挡之。

trans-unit.source: "Springjacks and faeries can be difficult to hunt, but my favorite prey are the flamekin. They never fail to put up a worthy fight when cornered."
trans-unit.target: 「兔脚羊与仙灵都不易猎捕，但我最爱的猎物是炎身。 他们被逼到无处可逃时，都会与我痛快打一场。」

trans-unit.source: Immaculate Magistrate
trans-unit.target: 无垢官员

trans-unit.resname: LRW·219 | Immaculate Magistrate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：你每操控一个地精，就在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.
trans-unit.target: 无垢阶级的地精将植物织成活物～有时用来献给出色战士，有时用来创造无上艺术品。

trans-unit.source: Imperious Perfect
trans-unit.target: 骄傲至美

trans-unit.resname: LRW·220 | Imperious Perfect | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其它地精生物得+1/+1。 {G}，{T}：将一个1/1绿色的地精／战士衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.
trans-unit.target: 在美感的文化中，会将最美丽者崇敬如神。

trans-unit.source: Incremental Growth
trans-unit.target: 增值成长

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，另一个目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物，并在第三个目标生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size."\n—Kithkin superstition
trans-unit.target: 「在桥下吊只老鼠，你的甘蓝菜就会长到三倍大。」 ～洁英的迷信

trans-unit.source: Jagged-Scar Archers
trans-unit.target: 锯疤箭手

trans-unit.resname: LRW·222 | Jagged-Scar Archers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.\n{T}: CARDNAME deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量与防御力各等同于由你操控的地精之数量。 {T}：CARDNAME对目标具飞行异能的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于其力量。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Daggerdare
trans-unit.target: 洁英短刀客

trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {G}，{T}：目标进行攻击的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The kith dance their elaborate reels not merely to celebrate the events of their lives but to form an unbreakable bond of loyalty with their kin, a bond stronger than the fear of death itself.
trans-unit.target: 洁英优雅地回旋起舞，不只用来纪念生命中的大事，也建立起族人间坚定的忠诚连结，足以克服对死亡的恐惧。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Mourncaller
trans-unit.target: 洁英悼亡人

trans-unit.source: Whenever an attacking Kithkin or Elf is put into your graveyard from play, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个进行攻击的洁英或地精从场上置入你的坟墓场时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Eidren's hunts are dangerous affairs. All dread the inevitable recounting of those who died while flushing out his prey.
trans-unit.target: 艾简的出猎充满危险。 对着其猎物涌上时，所有人都害怕地将阵亡人数一次次重算。

trans-unit.target: 渗浸月地黄

trans-unit.source: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Whenever it deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。 （每当此生物对任一生物造成伤害时，消灭后者。） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·225 | Lace with Moonglove | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?"\n—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue
trans-unit.target: 「何者更毒：月地黄的花朵，或是地精的心灵？」 ～煽火炎身维季佛

trans-unit.source: Lammastide Weave
trans-unit.target: 收获节编织

trans-unit.source: Name a card, then target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If that card is the named card, you gain life equal to its converted mana cost.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 说出一个牌名，然后目标牌手将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。 如果那是该名称的牌，则你获得等同于其总法术力费用的生命。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "A ribbon torn will ward away dark dreams."
trans-unit.target: 「断落的丝带能把不祥眠梦赶走。」

trans-unit.source: Leaf Gilder
trans-unit.target: 金叶师

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那的至美艾简命令数百株树起身，好依照自己认定的美丽模样重新栽下。 金叶林就此诞生。

trans-unit.source: Lignify
trans-unit.target: 木质化

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature is a 0/4 Treefolk with no abilities.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物是0/4树妖且不具异能。

trans-unit.source: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his *feet* be so thirsty?
trans-unit.target: 伯高愣住了。 这沙沙声响是怎么回事，身体又为何如此僵硬？ 而他的脚怎会觉得那么渴？

trans-unit.resname: LRW·229 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lys Alana Huntmaster
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那领猎人

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用地精咒语时，你可以将一个1/1绿色的地精／战士衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: LRW·229 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.
trans-unit.target: 从晓明殿最高的一层，直到蒙鸠地最暗的阴影，此号角的银色音符在空气中闪烁，让听闻者都为之牵动。

trans-unit.source: Masked Admirers
trans-unit.target: 假面崇美者

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nWhenever you play a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 每当你使用生物咒语时，你可以支付{G}{G}。 若你如此作，则将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."
trans-unit.target: 「美丽决定价值，而我们判定美丽。」

trans-unit.source: Nath's Elite
trans-unit.target: 纳斯精兵

(Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡CARDNAME的生物皆须阻挡之。 当CARDNAME进场时，与一位对手比点。 若你赢，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 （参与比点的牌手各展示其牌库顶牌，然后将该牌置于牌库顶部或底部。 所展示的牌之总法术力费用比较高的牌手赢得比点。）

trans-unit.source: Vigilance, trample
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏

trans-unit.source: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."
trans-unit.target: 「尽管漫游，你的根总会留在所萌智的坚固土壤中。」

trans-unit.source: Primal Command
trans-unit.target: 原初指命

trans-unit.source: Choose two Target player gains 7 life; or put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library; or target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library; or search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～目标牌手获得7点生命；或将目标非生物永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶；或目标牌手将其坟墓场洗入其牌库；或从你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Destroy target noncreature permanent. If you control a Treefolk, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非生物永久物。 若你操控树妖，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "All the sylvan secrets of this world are etched between my rings. The skinfolk's metal aberrations can rot between my roots."\n—Colfenor, the Last Yew
trans-unit.target: 「这世上所有的森林秘密都刻在我年轮间。 而没树皮者的金属劣物该在我树根间腐坏。」 ～末代紫杉柯芬诺

trans-unit.source: "May you shade three generations of seedlings."
trans-unit.target: 「愿你能庇荫三代的苗木。」

trans-unit.source: Spring Cleaning

(Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。 与一位对手比点。 若你赢，则消灭由所有对手操控的所有结界。 （参与比点的牌手各展示其牌库顶牌，然后将该牌置于牌库顶部或底部。 所展示的牌之总法术力费用比较高的牌手赢得比点。）

trans-unit.target: 森林回响

trans-unit.source: Whenever you clash and win, you may draw a card. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你比点并赢了，你可以抓一张牌。 （此异能在比点结束后触发。）

trans-unit.source: It takes a huntmaster's eye to discern the contours of mythical prey.
trans-unit.target: 要有领猎人的眼光才能辨识神秘猎物的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Timber Protector
trans-unit.target: 林场保护人

trans-unit.resname: LRW·238 | Timber Protector | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Treefolk creatures you control get +1/+1.\nOther Treefolk and Forests you control are indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其它树妖生物得+1/+1。 由你操控的其它树妖与树林均不会毁坏。

trans-unit.source: In his presence, an ordinary grove becomes a bastion to turn spells and break armies.
trans-unit.target: 他只消现身，再寻常不过的树丛都能化身为百咒不侵、千军难破的堡垒。

trans-unit.target: 先兆树妖

trans-unit.resname: LRW·239 | Treefolk Harbinger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a Treefolk or Forest card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张CARDNAME或树林牌，展示该牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。

trans-unit.source: Vigor
trans-unit.target: 活力

trans-unit.source: Trample\nIf damage would be dealt to a creature you control other than CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 如果由你操控且不是CARDNAME的生物将受到伤害，则防止该伤害。 每以此法防止1点伤害，就在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME从任何地方置入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: "If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form."\n—Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower
trans-unit.target: 「如果有人能把哪项美德与碍眼连在一起，那就是将它们处理掉时展现的天份。 我曾见过近乎艺术等级的波尬屠杀。」 ～金叶筛除者菲雅拉

trans-unit.target: 不论自己是否喜欢，化形都无法拒绝新型体的诱惑。

trans-unit.source: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, untap all Forests you control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, remove one from the game face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)\n{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.\n{R}, {T}: You may play the removed card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 掩蔽 （此地须横置进场。 当它进场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地移出对战，然后将其余的牌置于你牌库底。） {T}：加{R}到你的法术力池中。 {R}，{T}：如果某对手在本回合中受到7点或更多伤害，则你可以使用所移出对战的牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, you may reveal a Merfolk card from your hand. If you don't, CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: Below the great river, a bustling hub channels the flow of merrow trade.
trans-unit.target: 在大河底下，繁忙的中继站连通着各项美洛交易。
